examples: It is a sheerly physical struggle trying to find enough water each day in order to survive.
His poems are more sheerly beautiful than those of any other modern poet I can think of.

body_content.explanation: only, or happening because of nothing except:
examples: Good executives are not driven sheerly by money.
The deal failed sheerly due to lack of adequate access to finance.

body_content.explanation: in an extremely steep way that is almost vertical:
examples: It is one of the most difficult and sheerly vertical climbs in the world.
The tower, two hundred feet of marble, rises sheerly above the trees.
